arts.ttl: Milan 2 – Napoli 1 at San Siro | Pulisic and Saelemaekers react: “Incredible sacrifices”
arts.sum: Christian Pulisic, decisive today with a goal and an assist, spoke to DAZN after Milan-Napoli 2-1. Here are his words: How was the match? "The sacrifices we made today were incredible, especially how we defended after the red card… Top, top." About the new players, Pulisic replied: “The coach also did very well to get […]

arts.ttl: Pulisic praises ‘incredible’ spirit from Milan after 2-1 win against Napoli
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Christian Pulisic was the big hero for AC Milan in their 2-1 win against Napoli, and after the game, he shared his thoughts with the media. Pulisic was named the MOTM in our player ratings, though that is no surprise as he got the assist for the first goal and then scored the second goal […] The post Pulisic praises ‘incredible’ spirit from Milan after 2-1 win against Napoli appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Milan 2 – Napoli 1 | Rabiot reacts: “Playing with Modric is easy”
arts.sum: Adrien Rabiot spoke to DAZN after Milan-Napoli 2-1. Here are the French midfielder’s statements: How did you take control of the team so quickly? “It’s true I know the coach and all the staff well, their way of working, so it was easier. I also know many teammates. I arrived with humility, working every day […]

arts.ttl: Allegri breaks down Milan’s win against Napoli and plan for attack: “The important thing”
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller After the game between Milan and Napoli, Max Allegri spoke to the media and praised his side for defending the 2-1 lead with great fighting spirit. It ended up being a nerve-racking affair at San Siro as Milan had to play most of the second half with ten men. Pervis Estupinan was sent off and […] The post Allegri breaks down Milan’s win against Napoli and plan for attack: “The important thing” appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Roma beats Verona to move 2nd in Serie A ahead of Napoli’s mouthwatering match at Milan
arts.sum: Artem Dovbyk scored his first goal of the season on his first start for Roma as he set the Giallorossi on the way to a 2-0 win over Hellas Verona, which was left to rue one of the misses of the season. Fiorentina forward Moise Kean had two goals disallowed for offside in an entertaining 0-0 draw in a derby match at Pisa.

Massimiliano Allegri spoke to DAZN after Milan-Napoli, a big match won 2-1 by the Rossoneri despite being a man down. Here are his full statements: On the match: “I’m happy, it was an important test. Very difficult game against a Napoli team with great quality. We played a great first half. In the second half, […]

arts.ttl: Pulisic’s red hot form decisive in 2-1 Milan win over Napoli
arts.sum: In an emotional night at the San Siro stadium, Massimiliano Alleri's AC Milan beat Antonio Conte's Napoli 2-1 despite playing with ten men from the 60th minute. Once again, the spotlight fell on ex Chelsea and Borussia Dortmund forward Christian Pulisic. First, the 27-year-old star set up Alexis Saelemaekers with a fine assist, then he […]

arts.ttl: Milan’s gritty win over Napoli shows why they are in a title race
arts.sum: Serie A giants Milan picked up a very gritty 2-1 win over Napoli and it came despite Max Allegri’s side playing over 35 minutes with just ten men. Pervis Estupinan…
